軽薄短小: (けいはくたんしょう) - (yoji) small and light
軽衫: (カルサン) - hakama fashioned in the style of the pantaloons worn by the Portuguese (por: calção)
軽袗: (カルサン) - hakama fashioned in the style of the pantaloons worn by the Portuguese (por: calção)
軽装: (けいそう) - lightweight equipment or dress
軽視: (けいし) - making light of; slight; ignore; neglect; contempt; disdain
軽車両: (けいしゃりょう) - light vehicle lacking a motor (e.g. cart, bicycle)
軽軽: (けいけい) - (usu. as 軽々に) indiscreetly; thoughtlessly; carelessly; frivolously
軽軽しい: (かるがるしい) - indiscreet; thoughtless; careless; frivolous
軽輸送ヘリコプター: (けいゆそうヘリコプター) - light transport helicopter
軽速歩: (けいはやあし) - posting trot (horse gait)
軽重: (けいちょう) - relative weight; relative importance
軽量端末: (けいりょうたんまつ) - thin client
軽量級: (けいりょうきゅう) - lightweight class
軽鬆土: (けいそうど) - loam/humus; soil formed from fine volcanic ash
較べる: (くらべる) - to compare/to make a comparison; to compete/to vie
較優位論: (かくゆういろん) - theory of comparative advantage
較正: (こうせい) - (校正 only) proofreading/correction of press; calibration
載す: (のす) - to place on (something); to take on board; to give a ride to
載せる: (のせる) - to place on (something); (esp. 乗せる) to give (someone) a ride/to give a lift/to pick up/to help on board; (esp. 載せる) to load (luggage)/to carry/to take on board; to send out (on the airwaves, etc.); to deceive/to take for a ride; to (sing) along with (musical accompaniment); to let (someone) take part; to excite (someone); (載せる only) to publish (an article)/to run (an ad)
載せ込み: (のせこみ) - loading/loading up (onto, into); uploading
載せ込む: (のせこむ) - to load/to load up (onto, into); to upload
載っかる: (のっかる) - to get on; to climb on
載る: (のる) - to be placed on/to be set on/to be piled on/to be loaded on; to appear (in print)/to be mentioned/to be recorded/to be reported/to be given
載架: (さいか) - laying across to form a bridge
載貨吃水: (さいかきっすい) - ship's draft; ship's draught
載貨吃水線: (さいかきっすいせん) - Plimsoll line; Plimsoll mark; load line
載貨喫水線: (さいかきっすいせん) - Plimsoll line; Plimsoll mark; load line
輔く: (たすく) - to help; to save; to rescue
輔ける: (たすける) - to help; to save; to rescue; to give relief to; to spare (life); to reinforce; to promote; to abet
輔す: (ふす) - (not really v5s) to appoint; to designate
輔佐: (ほさ) - aid; help; assistance; assistant; counselor; counsellor; adviser; advisor
輔弼: (ほひつ) - giving the Emperor advice on affairs of state; assistance; counsel
輔星: (ほせい) - Alcor; the Little Horseman star
輜重兵: (しちょうへい) - Transportation Corps (service branch of the Imperial Japanese Army)
輝かしい: (かがやかしい) - brilliant; glorious; glittering; bright; splendid (e.g. achievement, success); promising (e.g. future)
輝かす: (かがやかす) - to light up; to brighten
輝き渡る: (かがやきわたる) - to shine out far and wide
輝やかしい: (かがやかしい) - brilliant; glorious; glittering; bright; splendid (e.g. achievement, success); promising (e.g. future)
輝点: (きてん) - light spot (e.g. blip on radar); always-on pixel (as a defect in LCD screens, etc.); calescence point
輝煌帝: (きこうてい) - poetic word for the sun
輝石安山岩: (きせきあんざんがん) - pyroxene andesite
輝銅鉱: (きどうこう) - vitreous copper; copper glance; chalcocite
輦車: (れんしゃ) - wheeled palanquin (with a castle-shaped box)
輩出: (はいしゅつ) - turning out in great numbers; appearing one after the other
輪: (rin/wa) - wheel , counter for wheels and flowers
輪っか: (わっか) - ring/loop (of rope); halo (of an angel)
輪っぱ: (ワッパ) - circular obento box; something ring-shaped; (as in ワッパをかける) handcuffs
輪をかける: (わをかける) - to exceed; to be even more (so); to exaggerate
輪を掛ける: (わをかける) - to exceed; to be even more (so); to exaggerate
輪を描く: (わをかく) - to form a circle/to move in a circle; to draw a circle
輪乗り: (わのり) - riding (a horse) in a circle
